title: Website "newbiliser"
content:
I need your help, guys...
I've once seen a link on one of the forums - to a program which uses the search engine of google, but it also changes the website text to the so-called "n00bish"[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] - absolutely slang english.

I've forgotten its name though and I've also lost the link to it. I know it was somewhere here, but I can't find the topic anymore.

Do any of you remember?------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

"Take evasive action!"

title: Re: Website "newbiliser"
content:
I remember one: [url=http://www.gizoogle.com]www.gizoogle.com[/url] Amusing, but don't know if that's what you're looking for.

Edit: By the way, as if you weren't going to already, search Commander Keen...
